theEnforcer:ExplodingShieldPower.NAME: Exploding Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, apply half of your block as damage to a random enemy.

theEnforcer:GainedBlockPower.NAME: Gained Block
DESCRIPTIONS: The amount of block accumulated this turn.

theEnforcer:UpgradedExplodingShieldPower.NAME: Exploding Shield +
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, apply half of your block as damage to all enemies.

DESCRIPTIONS: You have used a #yStimulant this battle.

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity per turn.
